FuncDef:
The protocol-statistics enable command enables statistics about user protocol packets.
The undo protocol-statistics enable command disables statistics about user protocol packets.
By default, statistics about user protocol packets are disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To monitor protocol packets for online users, run the protocol-statistics enable command to collect statistics about ND, PPPoE, PPP, DHCPv4, and DHCPv6 packets.
Configuration Impact
After the protocol-statistics enable command is run, the display access-user user-id verbose command output will display statistics about ND, PPPoE, PPP, DHCPv4, and DHCPv6 packets.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
